title.@value: Bipolar type I disorder, currently in partial remission, most recent episode mixed

definition.@value: Bipolar type I disorder, currently in partial remission, most recent episode mixed is diagnosed when the definitional requirements for Bipolar type I disorder have been met and the most recent episode was a mixed episode. The full definitional requirements for the episode are no longer met but some significant mood symptoms remain.

label.@value: Bipolar type I disorder, currently in partial remission, most recent episode mixed
